text: Marian McPartland (born Margaret Turner; 20 March 1918 â€“ 20 August 2013) was an English composer, writer and jazz pianist. She was the host of Marian McPartland's Piano Jazz on National Public Radio between 1978 and 2011. McPartland was born in Slough, Buckinghamshire. She died at 95 of natural causes in Port Washington, New York. ==References== Category:1918 births Category:2013 deaths Category:British jazz musicians Category:English composers Category:English pianists Category:Entertainers from Buckinghamshire Category:British Grammy Award winners Category:Jazz pianists
title: Marian McPartland
